future go to the free graphs here 2 **description ** if you need a fun accessory that s perfect for halloween or any time of year then you need the patchwork halloween bag this eye-catching and playful design is worked in 13 individual squares seamed together to maximize the fun of the season each square is worked from the bottom up and then seamed together to form the body of the bag the straps are worked directly onto the body and a few rounds of surface crochet are added for strength and cuteness have a festive halloween with this fun accessory that makes a great trick-or-treat bag too feel free customize the look of your bag by mixing up the arrangement of the squares the border and strap colors and changing the seaming as you d like the basic design is a fun and easy square that you can use to make the bag or use as a piece of a separate design and don t let the color work worry you if you can do a single_crochet you can make this design just check your gauge and keep your gauge even this pdf includes the print graph written instructions and assembly instructions images of the graphs and the written instructions for seaming are available on divinedebris com the sample in the photos was made in diyarn by lion brand yarn 3 affiliate link check out the crochet kit here 4 affiliate link you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may
